data.fullContent: I once went to a beautiful park in the town of Roseville. The park had green grass and places to sit in the sun. There was a playground for the children, and tennis courts for adults. On hot days, a man walked around selling ice cream. It was a great place to spend a day.
data.answer: 我曾经去过罗斯维尔镇的一个美丽的公园。公园里有绿色的草地和可以在阳光下坐着的地方。那里有孩子们的操场，还有成年人的网球场。天热的时候，一个男人在街上卖冰淇淋。那是一个度过一天的好地方。
